alert.note: Alert for Okaloosa Coastal (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 09 at 5:09PM EDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Okaloosa County through 500 PM CDT... At 408 PM CDT, National Weather Service doppler radar indicated a strong thunderstorm over Cinco Bayou, or over Fort Walton Beach, moving southeast at 10 mph. Outflow from this storm will affect areas to the north and there is some evidence of a wake that low may be developing in this area producing strong wind gusts. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Wright, Fort Walton Beach, Destin, Eglin AFB, Mary Esther, Ocean City, Lake Lorraine, Shalimar and Cinco Bayou. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
